thread.section_title: Ptr Finance Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ptr Finance Group | www.ptrfinance.com.au
thread.title: Glenn Charmain
thread.title_full: Ptr Finance Group reviewed by Glenn and Charmain

author: Glenn and Charmain
title: Glenn Charmain
text:
Peter , Abe and Sam went above and beyond in securing my asset finance.. Always kept me up to date with progress and assisted me in an impressive manner to understand the processes involved and which path was best suited to my situation..
I Recommend PTR everyone and I will be a returning customer
